name: End of the Journey? PDT DOCUMENTAR

pages.text: $(o)At last... I have managed to defeat this great threat to our world.$(br2)$(o)After the explosion, the dragon remains fell to the bottom of the abyss of the End.$(br2)Unfortunately, this journey does not end yet, there are still other possible threats in our world that must be defeated.
$(li)Don't lose it!$(br)$(li)Repeat this process until find the End Portal.
